page.title: 16Housing around Braydon 2
page.content: Most of the houses and farms in this section are privately owned, some farms have tied cottages for their workers which go with the job. There are 4 houses owned by the North Wiltshire District Council and let, they are at present being renovated (09/85). All of the houses in this section have mains water and electricity but none have got gas although some bottled gas is used for cooking. The houses in Pavenhill have mains drainage but the rest have to rely on septic tanks. There is no major building project planned, the policy at present is to allow only infilling of any spaces within the Purton boundary.
